headline.print_headline: North Dakota Finds More Radioactive Oil Waste
headline.main: North Dakota Finds More Radioactive Oil Waste

lead_paragraph: North Dakota confirmed Thursday the discovery of a new radioactive dump of waste from oil drilling, and separately a company hired to clean up waste found in February at another location said it removed double the amount of radioactive material originally estimated to be there.
